name: TAB Scope BIG Preview
description:
This style is for a TAB big preview using TabScope (a la Opera but naturally better)
the tab preview title is hidden thanks to the transparent font "Trans.Text"
additional_info:
the "TabScope" extension is here > https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/tab-scope/?src=ss 
for the Trans.Text font go here > http://www.wincustomize.com/explore/objectdock/17101/
